Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Class ActorLocations.ActorIterator

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.ActorLocations.ActorIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Iterator<Actor>
Enclosing class:
ActorLocations
class ActorLocations.ActorIterator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Iterator<Actor>
Class to allow iterating over all Actors in the system, player first This allows Actors to take turns in a known order.
